messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention station we have sent our inspector chandler richardson to inspect the health conerns off your station please follow what he says and treat him nicely. have a nice day

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Thanks to your stations power being down. we will be calling the shuttle very soon. have a nice day and remember! if you dont report suspicious activity you will be prosecuted!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?
